entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Charlevoix
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:56 AM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -8.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Charlevoix 08:00 AM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023
Temperature: -8.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.4 kPa rising
Humidity: 90 %
Wind Chill: -11
Dewpoint: -10.2°C
Wind: WSW 4 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday: A few flurries. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. A few flurries beginning this morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 16 this morning and minus 8 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few flurries. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending early this evening then clearing. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 12.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 27 in the morning and minus 18 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Snow. Low minus 15. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023
